resources.string: If you don\'t have an account yet, sign up by clicking below
Click here to visit the official webpage of #IORESTOACASTELDILEVA initiative

"To receive your first coupon go to one of the businesses that adheres to the initiative and buy something. Then, go to \"My account\" and make the seller scan your user QR code. Now, if you go to see \"My coupons\", you will have an available coupon that you can use in any of the businesses that adhere to the initiative, just by showing your discount QR code. \\n Coupons can be used only once but you can collect them as many as you like! "
A better quarter goes through a better community

#IoRestoACasteldileva was born from the idea of a shop on the street which, in full Coronavirus emergency, instead of breaking down, thinks of something to restart with more strength than before. Thus the initiative was born, together with the other participating merchants, to sensitize the inhabitants of the area to choose the commercial activities present in the area. Why choosing local shops is a broad and multifaceted discourse, but nevertheless, all the participating businesses are committed in any case through this initiative to be more visible, to get to know some realities by those who do not yet know, to reward all together the inhabitants who choose to stay within our community.
Here are the business that offer special packages, complimentary services and discounts to customers that have a coupon.
Show your discount QR code to obtain a discount

Visit one of the businesses that adhere to the initiative to obtain a discount QR code, or go to Home and click on \"How It works\" to discover how to obtain amazing discounts in your beautiful quarter
Show your user QR code \\n to obtain a coupon
Click on the image to change photo
MG Gioielli (Gold price stuck at 40€/gr, 20% discount on a new watch if you scrap an old one)
De Gustibus Caffè (Minimum charge of 50€ -not cumulative)
Weekend in Italy at the minimum cost of 1500€
Wellness weekend at the minimum cost of 2000€
Every 5 sessions, a decontracting massage is free
For every 30€ of spending, a big beverage is free
15% discount on stationery store articles (Minimum charge of 10€)
20% discount on preparation with balloons (Minimum charge of 20€)
20% discount on beauty treatments (Minimum charge of 65€)
15% discount on make-up, face and body products purchase (Minimum charge of 55€)
